name: exempi
description:
exempi is a port of Adobe XMP SDK to work on UNIX and to be build with
GNU automake. It includes XMPCore and XMPFiles, libexempi, a C-based API
and exempi a command line tool.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: iconv
dependencies.description:
GNU libiconv provides an implementation of the iconv() function and the
iconv program for character set conversion.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: expat
dependencies.description: Expat is an XML parser library written in C.

dependent_to.name: py-python-xmp-toolkit
dependent_to.description: Python XMP Toolkit for working with metadata.
